src/lib/components/DashQueryBuilder.reac.description:
DashQueryBuilder is a Dash Component based on [`react-awesome-query-builder`](https://github.com/ukrbublik/react-awesome-query-builder).

It takes a `fields` property to generate the options for building the actual query.
The optional property `tree` is used to define the current state of the tree. It can be used to
define the starting state of the query builder.
The optional property `theme` is one of `material`, `mui`, `antd`, `bootstrap` or `basic`. This is the styling of the component.
These are the only themes supported by `react-awesome-query-builder`.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.

tree.description: The tree that describes the state of the query builder.

fields.description:
The fields that are used to populate the options for the query builder. This can be a very complicated object.
 See https://github.com/ukrbublik/react-awesome-query-builder/blob/master/CONFIG.adoc#configfields for more info.

sqlFormat.description: The SQL Formatted string defined by the current state of the tree

queryStringFormat.description: The Query String Formatted string defined by the current state of the tree

queryBuilderStringFormat.description: The Query Builder String Formatted string defined by the current state of the tree

mongodbFormat.description: The MongoDB Formatted string defined by the current state of the tree

jsonLogicFormat.description: The JSON Logic Formatted string defined by the current state of the tree

elasticSearchFormat.description: The JSON Logic Formatted defined by the current state of the tree

spelFormat.description: The JSON Logic Formatted string defined by the current state of the tree

alwaysShowActionButtons.description: Always show the Action Buttons (Add Rule, Add Group, Delete, etc.). If false, show only on hover.

config.description:
Customizable Config. Currently only usable for objects that do not involve functions. Cannot be used to modify conjunctions,
operators or widgets. Setting this is currently in alpha, it is very unstable.

loadFormat.description:
The Format which the Query Builder will load. Any changes made to that format will produce an update. Only that format will be able to load
the tree

theme.description: Sets the theme of the query builder.
